程序包 com.ae2dms

类 GameGrid

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GameGrid
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Iterable
public class GameGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable
This class generates the grid for the game.
从以下版本开始:
24 Oct, 2020
版本:
1.0
作者:
Source code provided by UNNC COMP2059. Modified by Gaole DAI(20124917), scygd1@nottingham.edu.cn

    This class iterates the grid.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameGrid

      public GameGrid​(int columns, int rows)
      This constructor initializes a 2D array.
      参数:
      columns - int type. As the input column value when initialize array.
      rows - int type. As the input row value when initialize array.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getDimension

      public java.awt.Dimension getDimension()
      This method returns the dimension of the array.
      返回:
      the Dimension

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(int col, int row) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method returns the location of the object if no exception.
      参数:
      col - int type. The column location of the target object to get.
      row - int type. The row location of the target object to get.
      返回:
      GameObject
      抛出:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - Throws when the array's index is out of bounds.

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point p)
      This method returns the coordinates of the object location.
      参数:
      p - Point type. The location of the target object to get.
      返回:
      GameObject

    • removeGameObjectAt

      public boolean removeGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point position)
      This method calls the putGameObjectAt method to remove the location of the GameObject, returns true for successfully removed, otherwise false.
      参数:
      position - Point type. The location of the target object to remove.
      返回:
      boolean value of whether successfully removed or not

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, int x, int y)
      This method sets the coordinates of the GameObject.

      Invokes the isPointOutOfBounds method to check if the object is out of bounds and return false if isPointOutOfBounds method returns true, else sets the coordinates and returns true.

      参数:
      gameObject - GameObject. The target game object to put.
      x - int type. The x coordinate that the target object will be put.
      y - int type. The y coordinate that the target object will be put.
      返回:
      boolean value, true if set successfully, false if the location is out of bounds.

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point p)
      This method calls the putGameObjectAt method to set the coordinates of the GameObject if the pointer is not null.

      returns true if the pointer is not null and setting succeed, false if either pointer is null nor setting false.

      参数:
      gameObject - GameObject type. The target game object to be put.
      p - Point type. The target location where the game object will be placed.
      返回:
      boolean value

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method translates the gameObject to a string.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
      返回:
      String

    • iterator

      public java.util.Iterator<GameObject> iterator()
      This overridden method returns a newly generated GridIterator object.
      指定者:
      iterator 在接口中 java.lang.Iterable
      返回:
      Iterator GameObject
